Posts.Content: Nov 9, 2007 09:41AM Kay2 wrote: I'm going in for lumpectomy on tuesday.   I'm taking my light sweat pants, as the last time I was in the hospital, I was freezing.  I guess a book to read, and my journal, as sometimes writing helps me think, and relax.  Not sure how to prepare for the surgery, sorry.
Posts.Title: Surgery tomorrow -- a little prayer! loretta Jellydonut
